TopicTitle: A great rescue on the mun

Articles.Content:
**3 brave kerbonauts have landed the Mun and 1 of them have made a fatal mistake...** **with that mistake the engine blew up and tipped over.** ESC has made a robotic rescue craft which saved the stranded kerbonauts on the mun 

heres the link for the images [**http://imgur.com/gallery/mvFAG/new**](http://imgur.com/gallery/mvFAG/new)

**ESC is EpicX space center not that esc key \*slaps finger away from the ESC key\* NOT THAT THING...**

 **THE END... for now....**

**(Make your story and how it could ended...** ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif))
I think this goes in the KSP fan works section.
I did make one in the fan works section it would felt repetitive but thanks for the feedback

In that case, closing as a duplicate of [thread=115039]this thread[/thread].

For future reference, moderators can move threads. You can get our attention by posting in [this thread](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/25176-Need-a-Thread-Moving-Removing-Closing-or-Post-Deleted) or hitting the report button, rather than posting in the thread which just adds to the clutter.
